block.selectivepowers.blumasc_plush.lore: Hey that's me. How cute. Place me or put me on your head.
block.selectivepowers.rikarashi_plush.lo: Thanks Hans for helping with testing this mod and discussing ideas.
block.selectivepowers.blubott_plush.lore: Thanks Anastasia for helping with testing this mod and discussing ideas.
block.selectivepowers.altar.lore: This Altar is used to make specific offerings. Its recipes can be seen in JEI.
block.selectivepowers.moon_sacrifice_blo: A compact storage option for your Moon Shards. It is also decorative.
block.selectivepowers.sun_sacrifice_bloc: A compact storage option for your Sun Shards. It is also decorative.
block.selectivepowers.crows_nest.lore: These nests can be found in trees. They can hold up to 3 items.
A sleeping version of an echo crab.
block.selectivepowers.moon_dust.lore: The dust that covers the moon. It has gravity.
block.selectivepowers.earth_glass.lore: Glass that displays the earth. Very decorative.
block.selectivepowers.moon_rock.lore: The rock the moon is made out of. Sadly, no cheese.
block.selectivepowers.jump_mushroom.lore: These mushrooms are very springy. Bouncing you into the sky when walking through them.
block.selectivepowers.solar_block.lore: The core of the sun. Shoots you away when touching it.
block.selectivepowers.m_solar_block.lore: The core of the sun. Shoots you away when touching it or trying to mine it.
block.selectivepowers.rose_bush.lore: Even though they're beautiful, they are difficult to traverse and have thorns.
block.selectivepowers.obsidian_sand.lore: A very heavy compacted dust. It comes from the sky.
block.selectivepowers.draconic_beacon.lo: The draconic power of this beacon allows players in its vicinity to fly.
block.selectivepowers.spore_mushroom.lor: This mushroom shoots its spores all around it, giving hallucinations to everyone close.
In its presence, no monsters can spawn. It also repels monsters already there.
block.selectivepowers.golden_goat.lore: This golden statue supplies an endless supply of godly liquid. Use a Goat Horn to fill it.
block.selectivepowers.tessla_coil.lore: This coil shoots lightning bolts around it, when powered by Redstone.
block.selectivepowers.decrepit_sacrifica: An altar to the old gods. Spend exp to gain some items.
block.selectivepowers.pitfall_trap.lore: Can be placed on shovel blocks and activates after 15 seconds.
item.selectivepowers.soulgem.lore: This gem may break your contract with a deity. But be warned it will hurt.
item.selectivepowers.denial_contract.lor: This contract can be used to refuse an offer of a deity.
item.selectivepowers.bound_contract.lore: A contract that can be read to show your current worship status.
item.selectivepowers.golden_idol.lore: An Idol made from gold and heat. Needed to use a normal Ability.
item.selectivepowers.blessed_idol.lore: An Idol imbued by the King in Yellow. Needed to use an Ascension Ability.
item.selectivepowers.beetle_horn.lore: The horn of a Solar Beetle. Very calcium rich.
item.selectivepowers.sun_horn.lore: A beetle horn that is supercharged by the sun.
item.selectivepowers.mooncap_mushroom.lo: These mushrooms love the moon. They can only be harvested in Moonlight.
item.selectivepowers.moon_sacrifice.lore: Concentrated Moon. This is used for Rituals in the Altar.
item.selectivepowers.sun_sacrifice.lore: Concentrated Sun. This is used for Rituals in the Altar.
item.selectivepowers.moonlight_jelly.lor: This small jelly tastes very sweet. It remedies some Yellow Fever.
item.selectivepowers.mooncap_seeds.lore: Plant these spores on grass at night to grow Mooncap Mushrooms.
item.selectivepowers.sun_slicer.lore: A sword made out of a Ray of Sunshine. Its fire can burn souls.
item.selectivepowers.moonlight_glaive.lo: The legendary weapon of the Lunar Maiden. Deals extra damage to the followers of the King in Yellow.
item.selectivepowers.moon_pendant.lore: The holy relic of the Lunar Maiden. Wearing it might help.
item.selectivepowers.crown.lore: A decorative souvenir. Not so well received by the Lunar Maiden.
item.selectivepowers.true_crown.lore: This crown holds some real power if worn by the Yellow King.
item.selectivepowers.salamander_scales.l: These Scales are shed by Salamanders regularly. You should collect them quickly before they are smelted.
item.selectivepowers.horned_helmet.lore: A leather helmet with horns. +3 Aura.
item.selectivepowers.corruption_shards.l: Shards from Corruption Masks. Maybe they can be used to gain some insight?
item.selectivepowers.yellow_ramblings.lo: These pages come from fallen cultists. Maybe they say something important?
item.selectivepowers.mask.lore: A decorative mask, made from the corrupting ones. Can be worn without worry.
item.selectivepowers.flaming_egg.lore: The egg of a Quetzal. Nothing will hatch from it, but destruction.
item.selectivepowers.moon_takoyaki.lore: Little snacks from the moon. Squids make these.
item.selectivepowers.burning_feather.lor: The Feather of a Quetzal. It is fiery to the touch.
item.selectivepowers.corrupting_arrow.lo: This arrow corrupts whoever it hits, making them worship the King in Yellow.
item.selectivepowers.beam_arrow.lore: This arrow summons a holy beam, when it lands on a block.
item.selectivepowers.solar_brick.lore: A Brick infused with the power of the Sun.
item.selectivepowers.ice_shield.lore: This shield shoots ice splinters, when hit.
item.selectivepowers.permafrost_shield.l: This shield shoots ice splinters, when hit. Vanishes when the ability runs out.
item.selectivepowers.flaming_hammer.lore: This mace lights up blocks below hit targets. Vanishes when the ability runs out.
item.selectivepowers.rage_cookie.lore: These cookies make you very angry for a short amount of time. During that you ignore all damage.
item.selectivepowers.lightning_bottle.lo: Shoots a lightning bolt to the entity you look at, jumping over to other nearby creatures.
item.selectivepowers.mushroom_skewer.lor: Made from Bouncecap Mushrooms. Try a nibble to float away.
item.selectivepowers.cooked_mushroom_ske: Cooked from Bouncecap Mushrooms. Gives you a short Jump Boost.
item.selectivepowers.battle_for_eternity: The battle music that plays while fighting the King in Yellow.
item.selectivepowers.chimera_core.lore: A hybrid of Fox, Hoglin, Rabbit, Chicken, Goat, Phantom, and Guardian. Use it on one to transform them.
item.selectivepowers.leafwalker_curio.lo: With these you can walk through leaves as if they were not there.
item.selectivepowers.solid_void.lore: Throws Void Pearls, that teleport you if they land in low light.
item.selectivepowers.dragon_sleeves.lore: While wearing these, you are immune to the Ender Dragon's breath attack.
Finds valuables while digging. Also breaks Meteor Dust extra-fast.
item.selectivepowers.elemental_gun.lore: Shoots Fireballs from the main hand and Wind Charges from the offhand.
item.selectivepowers.drinking_horn.lore: This horn holds the liquid of the gods. Drinking it grants their strength, but few can endure the side effects.
item.selectivepowers.lore_scroll.lore: For more information see: Scroll of Lore
item.selectivepowers.shelf_mushroom.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.octopus_mushroom.lo: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.mushroom_spores.lor: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.hip_book.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.hip_horn.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.sculk_moss.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.moss_layer.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.embedded_crystals.l: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.spine_tree.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.polarbear_pelt.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.flower_crown.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.elemental_circlet.l: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.lightning_ball.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.storm_cloud.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.enchanting_rune.lor: This is just a cosmetic item.
This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.celestial_rune.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.duality_pearl.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.breath_bauble.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.sculk_tendril.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.dragon_claws.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.dragon_horns.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.dust_mask.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.shoulder_crow.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.elemental_gloves.lo: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.glowing_eyes.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.face_paint.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.halo.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.miners_hat.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.rune.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.warden_horns.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.wolf_ears.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
item.selectivepowers.wolf_tail.lore: This is just a cosmetic item.
effect.selectivepowers.yellow_fever.desc: Obfuscates your screen and plays voices. Also gives you a headache when hurting the King in Yellow.
effect.selectivepowers.moon_bound.descri: Transports you to the Moon for as long as this effect is active.
effect.selectivepowers.rage.description: Makes you take no damage but saves it for when the effect ends.
effect.selectivepowers.truth_vision.desc: You are weakened, but can see the King in Yellow.
effect.selectivepowers.paralyzed.descrip: Movement speed is greatly decreased. Stops you from using items and mine blocks.
effect.selectivepowers.darkness.descript: Plunges you into darkness. Hinders your vision greatly.
effect.selectivepowers.ability_timer.des: Just a timer for your Power Ability.
effect.selectivepowers.ult_timer.descrip: Just a timer for your Power Ascension Ability.
effect.selectivepowers.hallucination.des: Makes you see and hear mobs, that are not there.
effect.selectivepowers.pinned.descriptio: Makes you unable to move. Can be removed by sneaking. On higher levels, deals damage when removing.
effect.selectivepowers.spiked.descriptio: Makes you take damage when moving.
effect.selectivepowers.pheromones.descri: Makes all mobs around you aggro towards you.
enchantment.selectivepowers.earthen_spik: On right-click, summons a spike from the ground that causes spiked effect.
enchantment.selectivepowers.splatter.des: Shoots projectiles out of targets you hit.
enchantment.selectivepowers.diviner.desc: Lets you sense aggressive mobs around you.
enchantment.selectivepowers.squid_encoun: Sprays ink on attackers when hit.
enchantment.selectivepowers.bulwark.desc: Reduces knockback taken but slows movement.
enchantment.selectivepowers.run_away.des: Increases movement speed at low health.
enchantment.selectivepowers.last_stand.d: Increases attack damage at low health.
enchantment.selectivepowers.evoking.desc: Summons evoker fangs when you are hit.
enchantment.selectivepowers.dash.desc: Allows you to dash forward by sneaking mid-air.
enchantment.selectivepowers.ender_pocket: Grants access to part of your Ender Chest.
enchantment.selectivepowers.charge.desc: Increases damage while sprinting toward your target.
enchantment.selectivepowers.collecting_p: Gives a chance to collect incoming projectiles.
enchantment.selectivepowers.buoyant.desc: Lets you walk on liquids while not sneaking.
enchantment.selectivepowers.cloud_step.d: Allows you to jump again while mid-air.
enchantment.selectivepowers.reverberatin: Breaks nearby blocks of the same type.
enchantment.selectivepowers.soul_rend.de: Greatly reduces damage but ignores armor.
enchantment.selectivepowers.sneak_attack: Greatly increases damage if both you and your target are at full health.
enchantment.selectivepowers.frenzy.desc: Deals extra damage when attacking the same target repeatedly.
enchantment.selectivepowers.reaping.desc: Steals potion effects from the target.
Lets you place sand by right-clicking.
Lets you place hidden traps by right-clicking.
enchantment.selectivepowers.pickerang.de: Allows you to throw your pickaxe to mine and attack at a distance.
enchantment.selectivepowers.dequiping.de: Deals very little damage but may remove worn armor.
enchantment.selectivepowers.gravity_impl: Pulls nearby mobs toward you on a smash attack.
enchantment.selectivepowers.sunray.desc: Summons a beam of light when arrows hit a block.
enchantment.selectivepowers.pinning.desc: Pins the target to the ground.
enchantment.selectivepowers.trailing.des: Leaves a poisonous trail behind flying arrows.
enchantment.selectivepowers.volley.desc: Arrows split into multiple falling arrows when shot upward.
Shoots weaker wooden arrows when no arrows are available. Ignores other Enchantments.
Grants slow falling while holding this bow.
enchantment.selectivepowers.echoing.desc: Loads echo shards to fire a warden-like sonic attack.
enchantment.selectivepowers.sharing.desc: Gives one of your potion effects to the target.
Loads lightning rods to fire chain lightning.
enchantment.selectivepowers.grape_shot.d: Loads cobblestone to fire a spread of small projectiles.
enchantment.selectivepowers.yoinking.des: May steal items from hooked creatures' hands.
enchantment.selectivepowers.flash_freeze: Places powdered snow when hitting a block or entity.
Pins mobs that walk over the bobber.
enchantment.selectivepowers.poseidon.des: Places water wherever the trident lands.
Makes your trident fire-based instead of water-based.
enchantment.selectivepowers.bouncy.desc: Blocking prevents damage but not knockback.
enchantment.selectivepowers.devouring.de: Blocking attacks drains the attacker's hunger.
enchantment.selectivepowers.contingeny.d: Teleports you randomly when the shield breaks.
The shield acts like a totem of undying.
enchantment.selectivepowers.pheromone_st: Applies aggression pheromones to hit targets.
death.attack.rage: %1$s was not able to persist on rage.
death.attack.soul.item: %1$s's soul was rended asunder by %2$s using %3$s.
death.attack.grape_shot.player: %1$s was riddled with grape shot from %2$s.
selectivepowers.messages.nopower: You have no affiliation to break.
selectivepowers.messages.notjustbound: Your bond is too strong for this item.
selectivepowers.messages.nolongerbound: You have declined the offer of the
selectivepowers.messages.bondbroken: You have severed your Soul from the
selectivepowers.tooltip.heading: §6§lContract Info
selectivepowers.abilities.bound.animal: Your tamed companions around you also gain your potion effects.
selectivepowers.abilities.bound.dark: You become invisible in low light levels.
selectivepowers.abilities.bound.elementa: You are resistant to fire and freezing damage.
selectivepowers.abilities.bound.light: You deal increased damage to undead creatures.
selectivepowers.abilities.bound.mushroom: You are completely immune to poison.
selectivepowers.abilities.bound.rage: Your armor value is always at least 12, no matter what you wear.
selectivepowers.abilities.bound.yellow: For all abilities and mobs, you are the yellow king.
selectivepowers.abilities.awoken.animal: Fully heal all your tamed companions.
selectivepowers.abilities.awoken.dark: Temporarily disable all light sources around you.
selectivepowers.abilities.awoken.dragon: Gain a flying speed for a time.
selectivepowers.abilities.awoken.rock: Form a protective block layer around you.
selectivepowers.abilities.awoken.element: Summon a Fire Mace and an Ice shield.
selectivepowers.abilities.awoken.forest: Let a ball of thorny bushes grow where you look
selectivepowers.abilities.awoken.light: Instantly make all undead mobs within range disappear.
selectivepowers.abilities.awoken.rage: Ignore all potion effects for the duration.
selectivepowers.abilities.awoken.storm: Shoot a lightning attack with a chance to paralyze.
selectivepowers.abilities.awoken.truth: Give all mobs around you the glowing effect.
selectivepowers.abilities.ascended.anima: Summon a flock of tamed companions that fight for you.
selectivepowers.abilities.ascended.dark: Turn the world around you into darkness.
selectivepowers.abilities.ascended.drago: Shoot Ender Dragon breath all around you.
selectivepowers.abilities.ascended.yello: Transport you and another player to the Deathmatch-Sun Arena
selectivepowers.abilities.ascended.eleme: Shoot Elemental Balls in all 4 directions.
selectivepowers.abilities.ascended.fores: Make a forest of trees grow all around you.
selectivepowers.abilities.ascended.light: Shine down a beam of concentrated sunlight, scorching everything in its path.
selectivepowers.abilities.ascended.mushr: Activate an aura of poisons, applying different potion effects to surrounding creatures.
selectivepowers.abilities.ascended.rage: Enter an unkillable rage that does not make you feel damage until the effect ends.
selectivepowers.abilities.ascended.storm: Rain down lightning on everyone around you.
selectivepowers.abilities.ascended.truth: Unlock the well of knowledge hidden deep within the world.
selectivepowers.abilities.ascended.moon: Send a target to the Moon.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.rock.remi: Meet me at the unbreakable barrier.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.dragon.re: Best one of us in combat.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.light.rem: Banish the foul creatures of the night.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.rage.remi: Pillage their land and end their lives.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.truth.rem: Find the old libraries below the earth.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.yellow.re: Wait for enough players to awaken.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.moon.remi: Wait for enough players to awaken.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.forest: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a I see you like my nature. Make all my children grow, and I will make you my champion.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.mushroom: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a We are the same. Consume us, become us, let us be one.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.animal: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a You seem to like our members. Convince some of them to join you, and we will grant you our aid.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.rock: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a You seem to like my earthly treasures. If you want my power, meet me at the unbreakable barrier.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.dragon: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a Do you like our might? If you best one of us in combat, we might share it with you.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.dark: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a You seem to like my presence. Come where my Wardens live, and I will make you a part of me.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.elemental: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a You have felt both my heat and my cold. Endure the assaults of elemental projectiles, and become one with them.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.light: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a You bask in my glory. Show your worth, and I will grant you the might of the Sun. Banish the foul creatures of the night.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.rage: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a Yes, steal what they have. Awaken your bloodline by pillaging their land and ending their lives.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.storm: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a You took my brunt force. You are pretty resilient. Make conduits for my power, and I will grant you a part of it.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.truth: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a Do you seek knowledge? Find it in the old libraries below the earth. There your search will be successful.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.yellow: Once they complete contracts, i will finally be able to defeat my brethren.
selectivepowers.messages.offer.moon: The power here is weak, but your powers persist.
selectivepowers.messages.awaking.forest: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a You have grown my children, and now you are one of them.
selectivepowers.messages.awaking.mushroo: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a We are one now. One and the same.
selectivepowers.messages.awaking.animal: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a You are now part of our flock. We are brothers.
selectivepowers.messages.awaking.rock: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a You really dug down deep. Here let nobody stop you from digging.
selectivepowers.messages.awaking.dragon: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a You are truly worthy. Join us as the apex predator of the sky.
selectivepowers.messages.awaking.dark: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a You came to my jail. Now spread my power and extinguish all lights.
selectivepowers.messages.awaking.element: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a You took the brunt of the elements. They are now a singular power within you.
selectivepowers.messages.awaking.light: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a You proved yourself worthy, a champion of the heavens. Protect your plane with this power.
selectivepowers.messages.awaking.rage: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a You are truly our descendant. Take our might and destroy and pillage everything.
selectivepowers.messages.awaking.storm: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a Truly, a worthy apparatus to channel me. Use my might and show others what you have endured.
selectivepowers.messages.awaking.truth: §6[§e%s§6]§r §a The knowledge you seek is here. Take it and be enlightened.
selectivepowers.messages.awaking.yellow: They took the bait, now let them bring sacrifices to the altar to banish them forever.
selectivepowers.messages.awaking.moon: A lot of power has Awoken. You have regained some power.
selectivepowers.messages.lose_ascension: Your Ascension has reverted after getting bested by another power.
selectivepowers.messages.devoured: The %s (%s) was devoured by the King in Yellow!
selectivepowers.messages.yellow_weakenin: Your power was weakened. You got %s lives remaining!
selectivepowers.messages.yellow_killed: The King in Yellow was finally exterminated!
selectivepowers.messages.yellow_ascended: The King in Yellow has ascended!
painting.selectivepowers.flip.title: Detective Flip
painting.selectivepowers.flip.author: BluMasc
selectivepowers.configuration.title: Selective Powers Configs
